name: Arena Master
description: Arena Master is the upcoming arena/survival game for SteamVR (HTC Vive). Grab your weapons and prepare yourself to face the ultimate challenge in the gladiator's arena! Fight your way through swarms of enemies to ascend to glory. Can you become the Arena Master?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1400 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive, one USB 2.0 or faster port, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2, or better
